trends: There have been 25 other sightings in Plano
There were no other sightings in Plano on or around September 3rd 2013
Summary: very organic looking but not birds
divs: Sighting Detailswe were talking about the reason for the widespread cell service outage in north texas today smoking a cigarette in the parking lot watch air traffic when this thing came over head, it made no sound and was gone almost as soon as we noticed it. it was suggested it might be birds but they would have had to be some really big birds in a very tight formation to look like a solid object. the way it moved as odd, it was very smooth motion and completely silent. we tried to follow it on foot and then it was just gone.
